story.text: The funeral was a blur, a somber gathering that brought the community together in a shared silence. The weight of the tragedy hung heavily in the air, an unspoken sorrow binding everyone present.

story.name: Leo's Mom
story.text: We need to stick together, Leo. We're here for you, always.

story.name: Leo
story.text: I just... I can't believe he's gone. It feels like it's my fault.

story.name: Leo's Dad
story.text: It's no one's fault, son. It was a tragic accident. We all miss him.
In the quiet of his room, Leo wrestled with memories and guilt, the echoes of laughter now replaced by an oppressive silence.

story.alt: Leo's empty room, symbolizing his isolation and grief.
